description:
Grab the Service Package and Get a 123$ course as a GIFT and a Ready made Template:

if you Join in this course with full price, you will be subscribed to Service Package. Our Expert Team will review your website personally and provide every Services and feedback you need to add Background videos in your website for Free. And you will also get a Ready Made HTML video editing Template for free. To get the Service join the course with full price. It will cost you 123$ only. And we will respond within 24 hours of your Purchase.

And also you will get our Super Successful Course of 123$ "Become an Algorithm Master &Create SuperFast Smooth Software" Absolutely FREE.

<------TAKE THIS COURSE NOW-------------> <---------DO NOT HESITATE------>

Today Almost every one has a website or blog and most probably you are one of them. And surely you are spending lots of time and effort to develop your site or blog to look like pro level website / blog . So if you want to make your site look like a Professional website like PayPal or Google by Adding Videos as your Website Background, You have to give 4,000$ Dollar to the Developers.

Or what about doing it by yourself and save all the money for your weekend Date. And don't worry you don't need to become a web-developer at all. All you need to make your site look like PayPal, is 123$ and 50 minute of your Life and after that you can add videos to website as Background just by yourself.

And If you grab the Service Package we will give you ready made codes, then all you need just add some links of videos.

What you will learn in this course :

Learn to use HTML5 video tag as a design element, by running it below other text and graphics on your website. This course runs through all the techniques of choosing a Perfect video for your website background and in six steps you will learn how to accomplish the job of coding and make the video responsive to screen sizes . Join now in this Quick Course of Using Videos as Your Website Background.

How this course is Designed

In the first section we will discuss how to choose or create the perfect video for your website background
  • by learning all the Strategies of choosing perfect video for website background
  • How to define the topic or activity of your website and express it through video
  • Using the theme color of the website
  • Proper Orientation of the video and other elements
And then in the next section we will learn
  • Adding HTML coding
  • Making the video responsive to various screen sizes
  • Using Java script for Touch screens
And we learn by seeing live example of those agendas. And attend quizzes and assignments to stay engaged.

So as you see it is a complete package of making your website / blog look like a pro.What are you waiting for, Join now.
title: Add Videos as Your Website Background, Strategies & Coding
